sentences.english: We need a plan to deal with grid failures.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要應對電網故障的預案。

sentences.english: Give as much time as possible to preplan on this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓儘量多時間在這方面有着預案。

sentences.english: Formulate disaster prevention and mitigation plans and strengthen disaster monitoring and early warning.
sentences.chinese: 制定完善防災減災預案，加強災害監測預警。

sentences.english: Formulate pre-proposal on fire fighting and emergency evacuation and organize regular fire drill.
sentences.chinese: 制定滅火和應急疏散預案，定期組織消防演練。

sentences.english: Faced with the Asian financial crisis, the company worked out a preliminary plan and initiated its self-protection scheme.
sentences.chinese: 金融危機，公司拿出了預案，並啓動了自保計劃。

sentences.english: “Better to land at an airport where there’s actual crash-fire-rescue, ” said the pilot, who requested anonymity because he did not have his airline’s permission to speak.
sentences.chinese: 最好還是在機場降落，那裏有迫降起火救援的預案。

sentences.english: Secondly, a preplan was launched to meet the emergency.
sentences.chinese: 二是緊急啓動應急預案。

sentences.english: We have the response plan for ensuring the supply in the sector of circulation.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，我們有全系統流通領域的應急保供預案。

sentences.english: Chuan Wenchuan earthquake, the China Seismological Bureau has launched a plan.
sentences.chinese: 四川汶川地震發生後，中國地震局已啓動一級預案。

sentences.english: The pre-plan worked out based on landscape ecology is an effective tool f…
sentences.chinese: 基於景觀生態學的預案方法是生態修復的有效工具。

sentences.english: Organize the program plan of start-up shut-down.
sentences.chinese: 組織編寫開停車方案以及預案。

sentences.english: The pre-plan worked out based on landscape ecology is an effective tool for ecological rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 基於景觀生態學的預案方法是生態修復的有效工具。

sentences.english: The emergency plan shall be reported to the port administrative department for the record.
sentences.chinese: 應急預案應報所在地港口行政管理部門備案。

sentences.english: Emergency Rescue System and Emergency Preplan Drilling in Metallurgy Enterprise;
sentences.chinese: 制定滅火和應急疏散預案，定期組織消防演練。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper explain the whole process of setting pre-plan by an example.
sentences.chinese: 最後，結合實例說明了建立預案的過程。

sentences.english: The development of an emergency plan is a rigorous task.
sentences.chinese: 事故預案的編制是一項科學嚴謹的工作。

definition: to crack down on/to take severe measures against
to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
to handle/to take care of/to punish
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to respond to an emergency/to meet a contingency/(attributive) emergency
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
